position: ASIC Digital Design Engineer, Synopsys | NIT Trichy'23

positions.subtitle: Festember
positions.description: • Ideated and executed events across 11 clusters.• Coordinated with multiple teams to ensure the smooth functioning of 50+ events with 20,000+ footfalls.• Contacted distinguished celebrities to bring them down as judges as well as to judge online pre-fest events.• Analyzed pain points in past events from conceptualization to execution and identifying ways to nullify them.
positions.title: Deputy Event Manager
positions.description_html:
• Ideated and executed events across 11 clusters.
• Coordinated with multiple teams to ensure the smooth functioning of 50+ events with 20,000+ footfalls.
• Contacted distinguished celebrities to bring them down as judges as well as to judge online pre-fest events.
• Analyzed pain points in past events from conceptualization to execution and identifying ways to nullify them.

experience.title: Program Manager-Green Action Fund
experience.description: • Analyzed the carbon footprint on campus to understand the contributing factors towards greenhouse gas emissions.• Designed a cyclical revenue model with a budget of Rs. 1 crore to ensure self-sufficiency of the fund by reinvesting a portion of savings back into revenue generating Renewable energy sources to achieve net Carbon neutrality by 2045.• Formulated a revenue sharing structure to deliver a year over year increase in savings for the college.• Devised the organizational structure to ensure the initiative can be completely student run.
experience.description_html: • Analyzed the carbon footprint on campus to understand the contributing factors towards greenhouse gas emissions.• Designed a cyclical revenue model with a budget of Rs. 1 crore to ensure self-sufficiency of the fund by reinvesting a portion of savings back into revenue generating Renewable energy sources to achieve net Carbon neutrality by 2045.• Formulated a revenue sharing structure to deliver a year over year increase in savings for the college.• Devised the organizational structure to ensure the initiative can be completely student run.

experience.title: Consultant
experience.description: • Provided advisory services for Startups/ Non-Profits. • Worked on 3 consulting projects (select engagements mentioned above) with a NPS of 100% across clients.• Forged partnerships with 3 organizations and 4 mentors as part of the Strategic Alliances subteam to bridge the gap between the industry and our organization through specialized resources and exclusive training sessions.• Attending case solving sessions to continuously improve my knowledge and foster an all-round development.
experience.description_html: • Provided advisory services for Startups/ Non-Profits. • Worked on 3 consulting projects (select engagements mentioned above) with a NPS of 100% across clients.• Forged partnerships with 3 organizations and 4 mentors as part of the Strategic Alliances subteam to bridge the gap between the industry and our organization through specialized resources and exclusive training sessions.• Attending case solving sessions to continuously improve my knowledge and foster an all-round development.

experience.title: Consultant
experience.description: • Worked on a project for the newly created MSME Trade and Investment Promotion Bureau (MTIPB) of the Government of TN.• Created a database of trade entities for MTIPB to engage with and classified them into relevant heads based on their functions to identify MSME clusters across TN.• Designed industry wise questionnaires to understand the nature of the support MTIPB can provide and help with framing targeted policies at the state level.• Analysed leather exports from India to formulate District Export Promotion Plans.
experience.description_html: • Worked on a project for the newly created MSME Trade and Investment Promotion Bureau (MTIPB) of the Government of TN.• Created a database of trade entities for MTIPB to engage with and classified them into relevant heads based on their functions to identify MSME clusters across TN.• Designed industry wise questionnaires to understand the nature of the support MTIPB can provide and help with framing targeted policies at the state level.• Analysed leather exports from India to formulate District Export Promotion Plans.

experience.title: Marketing Manager
experience.description: • Handled sponsorship and branding of the fest.• Contacted renowned brands to collaborate with NITTFEST and obtained corporate sponsorship for the same.• Researched market policies and crafted tailor-made sponsorship proposals for 200+ prospective sponsors.• Ideated with teammates on how to brand sponsors effectively, and implementation of unique branding strategies.
